question: How do I claim my Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account?
text:
How do I claim my Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account?
          
        
There are two ways you can claim your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account: 1) using your account claiming code or 2) using your Social Security Number (SSN).

If your data was migrated from Healthcare.gov or from the VA Department of Medical Assistance Services (Medicaid/FAMIS), you would have received an access code for your Virginia's Insurance Marketplace account via email or by mail. If you do not have your access code, you can enter your SSN to access your account.

Go to the
Virginia's Insurance Marketplace website
, and click Get Covered, select Register with Access Code shown below


Enter your Access Code provided in the notice you received from Virginia's Insurance Marketplace.



Access code page is set to access code tab by default.  If you do not have your access code, you can enter your SSN by clicking the SSN tab for the alternative method for claiming your account, as shown below.



Be sure to check the
I'm not a robot
function and follow the steps to move forward with logging in, then click
Submit
.
If you deleted the email and are unable to find your access code or cannot enter your SSN, please contact us for assistance.
